effect.short: Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
effect.full: Changes all Pok√©mon's normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.

flavorTexts.text:
The user disperses electrically charged particles,
which changes Normal-type moves to
Electric-type moves.
